articles.title: HYBE Addresses Accusations Of Using BTS's RM Against NewJeans - Koreaboo
articles.description: HYBE has recently clarified concerns regarding the simultaneous release dates of BTS RM's new album and NewJeans' double singles on May 24.
articles.content:
HYBE has recently clarified concerns regarding the simultaneous release dates of albums from two artists under its umbrella.
